body: Hi  Mostapha, thanks a lot for you email! I´m running a daylight factor analysis as you can see from the screenshot above.   Thanks for your suggestion of the .bat file but i have checked it and i still have the problem. Do you think that the "-u" value as input of additionalP (for stoppping the stochastic randomness) could cause the problem? Thanks a lot in advance Claudia [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/aKzb6ZpdrU7tHTryMYh34PBBAO4mQfEAXJsILuLUCUIn35Dks7ykOabdYuGySfmSzubeP*16nOIcx1w2HSjiVHrwM6ijbpQz/1.JPG)
